mv Foo S.Foo1
-- p.go --
package m

type S struct{}

func Foo(s S) {}

func xyzzy() {
	funcvar := Foo
	_ = funcvar
}
-- q/q.go --
package q

import "m"

func corge(f func(s *m.S)) {}

func plugh() {
	funcvar := m.Foo
	_ = funcvar
}
-- stdout --
diff old/p.go new/p.go
--- old/p.go
+++ new/p.go
@@ -2,9 +2,9 @@

 type S struct{}

-func Foo(s S) {}
+func (s S) Foo1() {}

 func xyzzy() {
-	funcvar := Foo
+	funcvar := S.Foo1
 	_ = funcvar
 }
diff old/q/q.go new/q/q.go
--- old/q/q.go
+++ new/q/q.go
@@ -5,6 +5,6 @@
 func corge(f func(s *m.S)) {}

 func plugh() {
-	funcvar := m.Foo
+	funcvar := m.S.Foo1
 	_ = funcvar
 }
